properties.areaDesc: Tishomingo, MS; Itawamba, MS; Lee, MS; Prentiss, MS; Union, MS; Pontotoc, MS
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 14 at 3:46AM CST until January 14 at 6:45AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for Poor Drainage Areas
for...
Union County in northeastern Mississippi...
Northern Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi...
Northwestern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi...
Northern Lee County in northeastern Mississippi...
Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi...
Southeastern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi...

* Until 645 AM CST.

* At 345 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to
thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding.
Overflowing poor drainage areas will result in minor flooding in
the advisory area. One to two inches of rain has already fallen.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
New Albany, Baldwyn, Iuka, Tishomingo State Park, Saltillo,
Guntown, Belmont, Burnsville, Ecru, Tishomingo, Midway, New
Harmony, Pratts Friendship, Burton, Wheeler, Etta, Sandy Springs,
Blair, Pinedale and Sherman.
properties.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
